articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: Crypto markets rallied Wednesday after the largest rate increase in almost three decades signaled policymakers’ resolve in clamping down on U.S. inflation while suggesting rate hikes of this magnitude would not be common.
articles.title: Crypto Markets Rally After Fed Says Largest Rate Hike Since 1994 Won’t be Common Going Forward￼ Cryptocurrencies rose in line with stocks.

articles.description: After dominating during the bull run, decentralized exchanges have been losing ground to CEXs as trading volumes plunge.
articles.title: DEX Trading Volume is About to Drop Below CEX Volume for the First Time in Over a Year
